justification: “Autonomy was measured with nine items … on a 5 point scale … (Vugts, Van den Hoven, De Vet, & Verweij, 2019).”
“Decision Making Competence was measured with six items … on a 5 point scale … (Wachner et al., 2020a).”
“Decision Satisfaction was measured with a slightly adjusted questionnaire (Sainfort & Booske, 2000) comprising five items … on a 5 point scale.”
“Participants indicated on a slider from 0 to 100 how much pressure they experienced to make a decision about donor registration.”
